title: Vape Nation
description: You must throw a smoke grenade towards an enemy before engaging.

title: Fuckboy
description: You can only loot fuckboy shacks.

title: Minimalism
description: You can not use a backpack.

title: Bird Watcher
description: You must go to every airdrop you see falling.

title: Viking Funeral
description: Throw a Molotov on an enemy after killing them.

title: Grounded
description: You can only loot the ground floor of any structure.

title: Road Rage
description: Only vehicle kills. No guns or grenades.

title: Hitman
description: Silenced pistol only with any other attachments. No armor or helmet.

title: This is my Rifle
description: The first gun you find is the only weapon you can use for the entire game.

title: Origin
description: Go to the center of the circle as fast as you can every time the circle shrinks.
